methods.name: public Builder setLockType(@LockTypes int lockType)
methods.comment:
* Sets UI type.
         * Default value is {@code LockTypes.PASSWORD}
         *
         * @param lockType The UI format
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setSourcePublicKey(@NonNull byte[] publicKey)
methods.comment:
* Sets public key using secure box encoding
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setRemainingAttempts(int remainingAttempts)
methods.comment:
* Sets the number of remaining credentials check
         * Default value is {@code 0}
         *
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public RemoteLockscreenValidationSession build()
